item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: https://moiraine-demo.test.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where your data is sent

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

·

Start Building Faster Websites Today

Build your blazing fast website with the power of the WordPress Site Editor and beautiful, pre-made designs from Moiraine. No coding skills required.

Get Started Today

Frequently Asked

Learn about our product

Got a question? We've got you covered! Check out the resources below and be sure to let us know if we can answer anything else.

What exactly is Moiraine?

Moiraine is a WordPress block theme that is designed to work with the new WordPress Site Editor. That means your site can be built with blocks, patterns, and other design elements that can be easily edited without any coding skills.

Do I need any other plugins?

Nope! Moiraine is designed to work with the native WordPress editor, meaning you don't need a page builder plugin to build a beautiful website on WordPress anymore. Of course, you can continue using your favorite plugins alongside Moiraine!

What if I've never used the Site Editor?

Don't worry, we'll show you around! The Site Editor is fairly new, and lots of folks are still trying it out for the first time. There's a lot to learn, but the site building power you'll unlock with all of the new design tools will be well worth it!

What are patterns?

Patterns are pre-designed page elements that you can drag and drop to create unique designs. Moiraine comes with an extensive collection of expertly-designed patterns, but you can also design your own patterns.

Still have questions?

Can't find what you're looking for? Let's have a chat!

Contact Us →

Testimonials

We love our customers

Customer happiness is at the core of our business model. If our customers aren't succeeding, we're not succeeding. See what they're saying below.

item.title: Building Modern WordPress Sites with Block Themes
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
The way we build WordPress websites is changing. Gone are the days when creating a professional website meant wrestling with complex code or expensive page builders. Welcome to the era of block themes—where beautiful, performant websites are just a few clicks away.

What Are Block Themes?

Block themes represent a fundamental shift in WordPress development. Introduced with Full Site Editing (FSE) in WordPress 5.9 and refined through version 6.0 and beyond, block themes allow you to design and customize every part of your website—from headers to footers, from blog archives to single posts—using the intuitive block editor interface.

Unlike traditional themes that rely on PHP template files and require coding knowledge to customize, block themes use a visual editor for all aspects of your site. This means you can modify your site's layout, typography, colors, and structure without ever touching a line of code.

The Power of Full Site Editing

Full Site Editing is more than just a feature—it's a complete paradigm shift. Here's what makes it revolutionary:

Visual Control Over Everything

With FSE, the familiar block editor extends beyond just post and page content. You can now edit your site's header, footer, sidebar, and other template parts visually. Want to move your navigation menu from the top to the side? Simply drag and drop. Need to adjust your footer layout? Click and customize.

Global Styles System

The global styles interface gives you unprecedented control over your site's design system. Change your entire site's color palette with a few clicks. Adjust typography across all headings at once. Create and save multiple style variations for different sections of your site.

Template Flexibility

Block themes come with a collection of templates and template parts that you can mix, match, and modify to suit your needs. Whether you're building a blog, a business site, or an online portfolio, you have complete freedom to structure your pages exactly how you envision them.

Why Block Themes Are Perfect for Modern WordPress

No Code Required

The most significant advantage? You don't need to be a developer. Block themes democratize web design, making it accessible to content creators, small business owners, and anyone with a vision for their website. The visual interface means what you see is what you get.

Performance by Design

Block themes are built on modern web standards and are optimized for performance. Without the bloat of traditional page builders or complex PHP processing, sites built with block themes typically achieve exceptional Core Web Vitals scores. This means faster load times, better SEO, and happier visitors.

Future-Proof Architecture

As WordPress continues to evolve, block themes are at the center of that evolution. By building with blocks, you're investing in a platform that's actively developed and improved with each WordPress release. Your site will benefit from new features and enhancements automatically.

How Moiraine Simplifies Professional Design

This is where Moiraine shines. While block themes provide the foundation, Moiraine takes it to the next level with 89+ professional patterns, cohesive design system, powerful customization options, and advanced features like the Menu Designer block.

Real-World Benefits

Speed to Launch: What used to take weeks can now happen in days or even hours. Cost Efficiency: No need to hire developers for every design change. Consistency: Patterns ensure design consistency across your site. Accessibility: Built with modern standards for everyone.

Getting Started with Block Themes

  1. Ensure You're Running WordPress 6.0 or Later
  2. Choose a Quality Block Theme like Moiraine
  3. Explore the Site Editor
  4. Start with Patterns
  5. Customize Global Styles
  6. Experiment Fearlessly

Block themes like Moiraine represent the future of WordPress—accessible, powerful, and user-friendly. Whether you're launching your first site or managing client projects, block themes provide the tools to succeed.
item.excerpt:encoded: Discover how block themes like Moiraine are revolutionizing WordPress site building with no-code solutions, full site editing, and professional patterns.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: 89+ Professional Patterns: Your Fast Track to Beautiful Websites
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Imagine having a professional designer on call 24/7, ready to create beautiful page sections for your website in seconds. That's exactly what Moiraine's pattern library offers—89+ professionally designed, ready-to-use patterns that transform website building from a daunting task into an enjoyable creative process.

What Are Block Patterns?

Block patterns are pre-designed combinations of WordPress blocks arranged in aesthetically pleasing, functional layouts. Think of them as design templates for specific sections of your website. Instead of starting with a blank canvas every time you need a hero section, testimonial showcase, or pricing table, you simply insert a pattern and customize it with your content.

The magic of patterns lies in their flexibility. While they provide professional design out of the box, every element is fully customizable through WordPress's block editor. Change colors, adjust spacing, swap images, modify text—all without touching a line of code.

Moiraine's Pattern Philosophy

Not all pattern libraries are created equal. Moiraine takes a different approach: patterns are the heart of the theme. Each of Moiraine's 89+ patterns is professionally designed, performance optimized, fully responsive, accessibility-first, and endlessly customizable.

Exploring the Pattern Categories

Hero Patterns: Make a Powerful First Impression

Your homepage hero is often the first thing visitors see. Moiraine includes 8+ hero patterns ranging from minimalist text-focused designs to image-rich layouts with call-to-action buttons. Each hero pattern is designed to be the perfect canvas for your unique message while maintaining visual impact.

Card Patterns: Versatile Content Display

Cards are the workhorses of modern web design. Moiraine offers 15+ card patterns for virtually any content type: blog post cards, service cards, testimonial cards, pricing cards, and team member cards. The variety ensures you'll find the perfect card layout for any content scenario.

Menu Patterns: Navigation That Impresses

One of Moiraine's standout features is its collection of 14 menu patterns, powered by the custom Menu Designer block. These are sophisticated, interactive experiences built with the WordPress Interactivity API—from desktop mega menus to mobile-first designs and sliding panel layouts.

Template Patterns: Complete Page Layouts

Why start from scratch when you can start from brilliant? Moiraine includes 14 template patterns—complete page layouts for common page types including homepage templates, about page templates, features page templates, blog archive templates, and single post templates.

The Menu Designer Block

Deserving special mention is Moiraine's Menu Designer block—a revolutionary tool for creating sophisticated navigation menus. Unlike traditional WordPress menus, the Menu Designer leverages the Interactivity API for smooth animations and modern interactions. You can build multi-level mega menus, mobile-optimized hamburger menus, and sidebar navigation panels—all without writing JavaScript.

How to Use Patterns Effectively

  • Start with Templates: Browse template patterns first for complete layouts
  • Mix and Match: Combine patterns to create unique pages
  • Customize Confidently: Change colors, images, and text to match your brand
  • Consider Visual Rhythm: Alternate backgrounds and vary content density

Real-World Time Savings

Without patterns, creating a professional homepage might take 10-12 hours. With Moiraine's patterns: browse library (15 min), insert patterns (15 min), customize content (2 hours), final review (30 min). Total: 3-4 hours—a 70% time reduction with better results.

Patterns and Performance

Moiraine's patterns are built using native WordPress blocks, which are highly optimized. There's no additional JavaScript libraries, no external dependencies, no bloat. The theme consistently achieves 100% performance scores on Core Web Vitals tests. Every pattern loads only the CSS needed for the blocks it uses.

Conclusion

Block patterns represent the democratization of professional web design. Moiraine's extensive pattern library doesn't just give you 89+ design options—it gives you confidence. Confidence that your site will look professional, that you can build quickly without sacrificing quality, and that you can maintain your site without external help.

Whether you're building your first website or your fiftieth, Moiraine's patterns provide the foundation for success. They're not just time-savers; they're creativity enablers, allowing you to focus on your content and message rather than wrestling with design details.

item.title: Performance Meets Beauty: How Moiraine Achieves 100% Core Web Vitals Scores
item.content:encoded:
In the world of WordPress themes, there's often a painful trade-off: beautiful, feature-rich themes tend to be slow, while fast themes are frequently basic and limited. Moiraine breaks this false dichotomy, proving that you can have both stunning design and exceptional performance.

Understanding Core Web Vitals

Core Web Vitals are Google's set of metrics that measure real-world user experience: Largest Contentful Paint (LCP) measures loading performance (target: under 2.5s), Interaction to Next Paint (INP) measures interactivity (target: under 200ms), and Cumulative Layout Shift (CLS) measures visual stability (target: under 0.1).

These metrics directly impact SEO rankings, user experience, conversion rates, and mobile performance. A 100% score means your site excels in all these areas. Moiraine hits 100% consistently.

The Performance Problem with Traditional Themes

Most themes perform poorly due to JavaScript bloat (animation frameworks, slider plugins, lightbox scripts), CSS overhead (unused styles for every possible feature), external dependencies (fonts, icon libraries), poor image optimization, and render-blocking resources that prevent page rendering.

Moiraine's Performance Architecture

Native WordPress Blocks

Moiraine uses native WordPress blocks exclusively, meaning no additional JavaScript libraries, optimized core code, and minimal overhead. Only the CSS and JavaScript needed for blocks actually used on a page are loaded.

Intelligent CSS Loading

Critical CSS is inlined for above-the-fold content, CSS is split by block type, everything is minified and compressed, and there are no unused styles. Unlike bloated themes with thousands of lines of unused CSS, Moiraine includes only what you need.

WebP Image Format

All of Moiraine's pattern images use WebP format, providing 25-35% smaller file sizes compared to JPEG, better compression than PNG, and native browser support across all modern browsers.

The Interactivity API Advantage

Moiraine's Menu Designer block uses WordPress's Interactivity API—a modern, performant alternative to traditional JavaScript frameworks. Traditional menus might load 60KB+ of JavaScript; the Interactivity API provides the same smooth interactions with just 5-10KB.

Real-World Performance Testing

Testing Moiraine on a standard WordPress installation yields: Google PageSpeed Insights - Mobile: 100/100, Desktop: 100/100. Core Web Vitals - LCP: 1.2s, INP: 8ms, CLS: 0.02. Additional Metrics - First Contentful Paint: 0.8s, Time to Interactive: 1.4s, Total Page Size: under 200KB (initial load).

Performance Without Compromise

These performance numbers come while providing 89+ professional patterns, 7 style variations, full customization capabilities, interactive mega menus, complete WooCommerce integration, and multiple template options. You're not sacrificing features for speed—you're getting both.

Why Performance Matters for Your Site

Better SEO

Google explicitly uses Core Web Vitals as a ranking factor. Faster sites rank higher, all else being equal. Moiraine gives you a competitive advantage in search results.

Higher Conversion Rates

Studies consistently show that faster sites convert better. Amazon found every 100ms of latency cost them 1% in sales. Walmart saw 2% increase in conversions for every second of improvement.

Improved User Experience

Fast sites simply feel better to use. Users are more engaged, spend more time exploring, and are more likely to return. Slow sites frustrate visitors and damage your brand perception.

Mobile Success

With mobile traffic dominating web usage, mobile performance is critical. Moiraine's lightweight architecture ensures excellent performance even on slower mobile connections and less powerful devices.

Maintaining Performance

Moiraine gives you a performance foundation, but maintaining it requires awareness: optimize images before uploading, choose plugins carefully, balance content comprehensiveness with page weight, and regularly test with tools like Google PageSpeed Insights or GTmetrix.

Performance as a Feature

Too often, performance is treated as an afterthought. Moiraine inverts this thinking, treating performance as a core feature from the beginning. Every pattern is designed with performance in mind. Every style choice considers load times. Every feature is evaluated against its performance impact.

The result is a theme where beauty and speed aren't competing priorities—they're complementary goals achieved together.

Conclusion

In a digital landscape where attention spans are measured in seconds and search rankings depend on milliseconds, performance isn't optional—it's essential. Moiraine proves that WordPress block themes can achieve both stunning visual design and exceptional performance.

Whether you're building a personal blog, a business website, or a complex e-commerce store, Moiraine provides the performance foundation your site deserves. 100% Core Web Vitals scores aren't just a goal—they're the standard. Fast sites win. Beautiful sites engage. Moiraine delivers both.
item.excerpt:encoded: Discover how Moiraine delivers stunning design without compromising performance, achieving perfect 100% Core Web Vitals scores while providing extensive customization options.
item.category: Core Web Vitals,Site Speed,WordPress Performance,Block Theme Performance,Web Optimization

item.title: FAQ
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
WordPress Reimagined

Build your site with clicks, not code.

Easily create beautiful, fully-customizable websites with the new WordPress Site Editor and the Moiraine block theme. No coding skills required.

Download Moiraine
Moiraine Features

Frequently Asked

Learn about our product

Got a question? We've got you covered! Check out the resources below and be sure to let us know if we can answer anything else.

What exactly is Moiraine?

Moiraine is a WordPress block theme that is designed to work with the new WordPress Site Editor. That means your site can be built with blocks, patterns, and other design elements that can be easily edited without any coding skills.

Do I need any other plugins?

Nope! Moiraine is designed to work with the native WordPress editor, meaning you don't need a page builder plugin to build a beautiful website on WordPress anymore. Of course, you can continue using your favorite plugins alongside Moiraine!

What if I've never used the Site Editor?

Don't worry, we'll show you around! The Site Editor is fairly new, and lots of folks are still trying it out for the first time. There's a lot to learn, but the site building power you'll unlock with all of the new design tools will be well worth it!

What are patterns?

Patterns are pre-designed page elements that you can drag and drop to create unique designs. Moiraine comes with an extensive collection of expertly-designed patterns, but you can also design your own patterns.

Still have questions?

Can't find what you're looking for? Let's have a chat!

Contact Us →

Wow, I really can't believe how powerful the WordPress Site Editor is combined with Moiraine. I don't even need a page builder!

Mandi Alpine

Product Designer

Launch Faster

No code? No problem. Design websites faster with patterns.

The future of WordPress site building is here. Are you ready?

Get Started Today
See Our Features
